encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1880-9/1884/84-07-28c-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ two months ¶ Two monthsoverQuart...

div.p: B84/6390, unit 43, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the two months
Two months over Quarter struck through.
ending 31 August 1884.

p.seg: The numbers in this column have been inserted, presumably at the Chief Secretary's Office.
They are probably authority numbers for the payments in question.
